title: All 32 - Philadelphia Eagles: Carson Wentz respect level around the league plus the controversial Jalen Hurts pick with Sheil Kapadia (Football 6/5)
description:
Our first week of the 'All 32' series wraps up with a focus on the Philadelphia Eagles with Sheil Kapadia of The Athletic. Sheil and host Will Brinson analyze the Birds offseason from the selection of Jalen Hurts to adding weapons around Carson Wentz to the starting quarterback himself. The guys then discuss defensive additions, a difficult schedule for Philly and Super Bowl goals for the team.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @SheilKapadia
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:subtitle: Does Carson Wentz have enough weapons to lead the Eagles back to the playoffs for the 4th straight year? Sheil Kapadia of The Athletic joins us to break down the Birds.

Our first week of the 'All 32' series wraps up with a focus on the Philadelphia Eagles with Sheil Kapadia of The Athletic. Sheil and host Will Brinson analyze the Birds offseason from the selection of Jalen Hurts to adding weapons around Carson Wentz to the starting quarterback himself. The guys then discuss defensive additions, a difficult schedule for Philly and Super Bowl goals for the team.
